nodes.text: The Food Processing Center was a type of building used for processing and packaging edible plant and animal products. Typically, the food processed in these structures is harvested nearby by workers - often labor droids - from such sources as farms, muja fruit bushes, or animals such as nerfs or banthas. During the colonization of the moon Alaris Prime food processing centers were built by Wookiee workers.
Food Processing Centers serve as resource drop-off buildings in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack.
